Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Rehash \Re*hash"\ (r?*h?sh"), v. t. To hash over again; to prepare or use again; as, to rehash old arguments. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Rehash \Re*hash"\, n. Something hashed over, or made up from old materials. [1913 Webster]

rehash n : old material that is slightly reworked and used again; "merely a dull rehash of his first novel" v 1: present or use over, with no or few changes 2: go back over; "retrograde arguments" [syn: {retrograde}, {hash over}]
